title: Madonna's daughter Lourdes Leon puts on a cheeky show in very ripped jeans during outing in NYC
text:
She's the daughter of one of the most famous people in the world.

But on Wednesday, Lourdes Ciccone Leon didn't merit a second glance as she took a stroll in New York City with a male friend.

Madonna's eldest child, who celebrated her 23rd birthday on October 14, blended into the neighborhood with her gray knit sweater and distressed blue jeans.

Blending in: Madonna's eldest child Lourdes Leon, who celebrated her 23rd birthday on October 14, stepped out in NYC Wednesday in a gray knit sweater and distressed blue jeans

However, her Levi denims were so ripped at the back that, from behind, they revealed part of the bare cheek of one buttock.

Her long black hair fell loose to below her waist and she accessorized with large hoop earrings.

Lourdes completed her look with white socks and white Nike trainers and carried a Louis Vuitton purse over one shoulder.

Saucy: However, her Levi denims were so ripped at the back that, from behind, they revealed part of the bare cheek of one buttock

Palling around: Her long black hair fell loose to below her waist and she accessorized with large hoop earrings. She completed her look with white socks and white Nike trainers

Lourdes's father is fitness trainer Carlos Leon with whom Madonna had a relationship from 1995 to 1997.

She is also half-sister to Madonna's son Rocco, 19, from her mom's marriage to British director Guy Ritchie, and to Madonna's adopted children David Banda, 14, Mercy James, 13, and seven-year-old twins Estere and Stella.

Like many celebrity offspring these days, Lourdes has an interest in fashion and made her debut as a runway model at last year's New York Fashion Week, walking for Gypsy Sport's Spring 2019 show.

Famous genes: Lourdes's father is fitness trainer Carlos Leon with whom Madonna had a relationship from 1995 to 1997. She's picturedat New York Fashion Week on September 10
description: Lourdes, who celebrated her 23rd birthday on October 14, paired her Levi denims with a gray knit sweater and white Nike trainers.
